website_summaries.verdict: A decent safe that comes at a good price to keep household valuables secure.
pros: Good amount of interior space on this model
Biometric can hold up to 50 fingerprints
cons: There is only one shelf on the interior of this safe

customer_reviews.title: Useless Biometrics
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write reviews, but this safe is so pathetic I feel I must. The Biometric Fingerprint technology is like kindergarten stuff. Even in setup it recommends you save the fingerprint in several positions to make your chances better. I was never able to get a thumb print to even be accepted. Even worse is that after 3 failed attempts to open it with a fingerprint it won't even open with the key. This safe is a total waste of money and Amazon should be ashamed of putting their name on it!
customer_reviews.author: RonMarCole

customer_reviews.title: ***DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: ***DON’T WASTE YOUR TIME OR MONEY!!! The batteries don’t stay in. The become loose even with the cover over it which makes the finger print not work. Also, the finger print is so inaccurate you have to try multiple times in different positions before it takes it and that’s even if you get it in time before the batteries come loose inside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small apartment and condo
customer_reviews.text: This safe provides very affordable fire and water proof protection at a very good price. It is large enough for all my documents and valuables, and heavy enough to be a problem to walk away with. (and it can be mounted to the floor for more security). It isn't going to offer the security of Fort Knox, but being smaller than a gun safe, it can be located in places where it would be difficult to not only find by "work on". Great security for the price. I am more than happy with the purchase and would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: JJJ

customer_reviews.title: Great little safe
customer_reviews.text: I was a little leery with only a Bio-metric and key opener on this safe. But the bio-metric opener has been working great. I found the best way to program it was to use only one finger for all 50 tries. It's big enough to hold 2 good size pistols and a couple hundred rounds of ammo and small personal items. After checking out reviews on tons of safes I have to say for the money, size and working quality this is a good little safe.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Mendell

customer_reviews.title: Hidden hinges
customer_reviews.text: My main reason for choosing this safe was the internal hinges. The safe was very easy to set up with my fingerprints. Instructions were excellent and it works perfectly. Very heavy and sturdy. My last safe was broken into by prying the door off and then positioning the safe just as I had it placed it, making it look like it was locked. Only some of the items were taken, with the intent of deceiving me on exactly what I had in the safe. I'm elderly, so they thought they could accuse me of having lost my memory! Sorry, caught them!
customer_reviews.author: glibrary

customer_reviews.title: 50 prints. Memory. A lot of space.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Programmed two fingerprints in it at different angles to be smart and not think that you'll have time and do the same position every single time esp when you REALLY need it. Can program 50. It is actually really big inside. Enough to fit 5 pistols on bottom and documents on top. Bolt holes in back and bottom. Felted bottom only. Has cuts outs so the felt doesnt bund up. You'll know once u get it, basically makes it easier for you. The batteries feel out for a few seconds (my error) after programming 10 fingerprints. And the memory held. Went from pissed to cool in 5 seconds. Usually the other way around. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Stacyloro

customer_reviews.title: My fingerprint doesn’t always open the safe
customer_reviews.text: I really like the safe. I had it professionally installed. It’s a perfect size for me. But I programmed my fingerprint and my sisters. It said it registered both fingerprints. I’ve had it for about maybe three months. My fingerprint worked once. My sister, her fingerprint works every time. Maybe I should’ve done a toe print. I always have to use my key to open the safe. Other than that, I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: thermo

customer_reviews.title: For the money it's a good safe.
customer_reviews.text: This safe is quite sturdy. Although the metal thickness is good, the design is what really adds the strength. Nobody is breaking into this safe without power tools. Even then, it will take too lo g to be worth the trouble. The 1 draw back I found, the finger print read wont accept my thumb. I know it's a small detail, but I would rather use my thumb. Also, I tried to open the safe 10 mins after a shower and was unable to do so. Not surprising but worth being aware of that detail. My opinion, for the money, it is a good safe.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you keep the key handy
customer_reviews.text: It may be a sturdy well built safe, however the biometrics don't work. It is very hard to register a fingerprint, and even harder to get it to recognize your fingerprint. They claim to have phone support yet I never received a call back. After two attempts I gave up. I really was looking for a biometric safe - now I have a safe with a key lock.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Ronald C. Markham

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS AMAZONBASICS SAFE
customer_reviews.text: This was a bad purchase. In the two months I have owned this safe I have had to replace the batteries 4 times. I don't need to access the inside often but every time I do the batteries are dead and I have to use the key to open the unit and replace the batteries. I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND THIS UNIT TO ANYONE based on my experience. Unfortunately my return window of opportunity with Amazon has closed. This is not high enough quality for Amazon to put their name on.
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: SUUUUUCCCKKS!!  Get your tools and bust into it easy peasy!! Not secure AT ALL.
customer_reviews.text: TOTAL GARBAGE. I thought this was good. The. It was easily broken into with basic household tools, i.e., a hammer and flat head screwdriver. I had to buy another safe after this one. I bought the next one up and it sucked too. You can read my review on that beauty. Don’t waste your time with these garbage safes. $200 isn’t enough. I had to buy a waterproof small one that weighs 20 lbs and is TINY. But it works as a safe should, ya know, like it’s contents cannot be accessed with some elbow grease. This safe here makes you wonder if that’s the actual function it is trying to achieve or just the appearance of being inaccessible. Absurd.
customer_reviews.author: yeetyea

customer_reviews.title: The name fits this one. It's just basic due to its issue.
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing fancy about this one folks. I wanted a finger print solution to get to my gun in the middle of the night (if needed) that didn't involve searching for keys or fumbling with a combination while I am barely half awake. This has a finger print option that was a real pain in the butt to setup and seems to function when it wants to. But it's a decent sized case for minimal price, so... It's a decent basic mid-size case. But don't get it with the idea the finger print sensor will always work when you expect it to.
customer_reviews.author: LostMyPen

customer_reviews.title: Good safe
customer_reviews.text: I had a bit of trouble programming the finger printing, the instructions are a bit short, but if you keep trying you will get there. There is enough space in here to keep all of my important papers, my gun, my laptop, and a few other things, and there is still plenty of room.
customer_reviews.author: Albest

customer_reviews.title: Returning this
customer_reviews.text: The biometric scanning system worked for 10 minutes, then had a nervous breakdown. No matter what I try now, I get 3 red beeps. Tried clearing the memory and starting over several times, no dice. Very disappointed, Amazon stuff has been good to me in the past.
customer_reviews.author: S. Imerman

customer_reviews.title: The biometric lock works if you make peace with the force
customer_reviews.text: Fingerprint programming worked well enough for me once I found a repeatable way to present my finger to the scanner. Scanning a fingertip seems to work most consistently, maybe because there is less surface area of finger to confuse the meager embedded system ensconced within this tin can. I have not yet been ‘locked out’ due to missed scans, but it does reject the first scan approximately 1/3rd of the time. Of those initial rejections, most were caused by my own poor finger placement on the scanner. Overall, the biometric lock works well. The construction is not terribly sturdy, but the safe works well for storing my meager pocketknife collection away from curious young hands.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Degelman

customer_reviews.title: Incredible paper weight
customer_reviews.text: This thing is useless. The finger scanning process to register your print does not work until 5-10 tries. Then it stops working even though you followed the directions and scanned the same finger twice. If you are looking for a key safe then this is adequate.
customer_reviews.author: ACM

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for, cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cheaply made safe. The bio-metrics do not work. It states it is not fire proof. I store items that at least require a key but would not recommend for weapons or any sensitive items.
customer_reviews.author: The BigGuy53

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and quick to open
customer_reviews.text: This safe was easy to setup, quick to open and very roomy. I would say that after the first day it reads my fingerprint 100% the first time, but I am careful to position it correctly. I didn't use the provided bolts, but instead bought some large wood bolts and attached it to the wall. I am very happy with this safe!
customer_reviews.author: Edward K. Tuholske

customer_reviews.title: fingerprint went dead during first attempted setting
customer_reviews.text: dissapointed. fingerprint function first beeped with fresh batteries, then when attempting to set it, stopped working, tried resetting, tried different batteries, tried everything, no longer beeped, no longer could go further in the setting process. Now have to use keys to open and close. Door seems secure, body is thin metal with holes for mounting. Definitely will not cause moisture damage to stored valuables. However, one could easily bore holes out bigger and use saw-zaw to cut their way in to get contents. It will slow down anyone from getting what's inside, but not make it very difficult. just my two cents.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Q

customer_reviews.title: Great safe for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Seems sturdy and secure. Fingerprint reader seems to work great, I entered mine 3 times to make sure it would read at different angles. Good size can fit a lot of stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid Little Safe!
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed with this little safe, setup several fingerprints and directions and it works well, bought a light for the inside and would recommend it for all your mini storage needs. Has all the mounting options to secure the safe but it has a nice heft to it and the door shuts quite nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Groat

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this for the average household.
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent save for the average household. It's not as heavy as the typical safe but once you filled it with the things that you hold dear, it's pretty darn heavy. I honestly doubt that if somebody breaks him they're going to try to carry that thing out. With all the things I've gotten mine I know I can't pick it up and the biometric reader works well
customer_reviews.author: T. Hulse

customer_reviews.title: Great simple floor safe for a closet or office.
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what I need it to do. Sturdy enough to secure valuables when bolted to the floor. Does not take up much space. Add a couple of automatic lights and you’re good to go. Fingerprint reader could be better. Have to put multiple angles of multiple fingers to make sure it opens quickly. However, that is to be expected in a value priced safe.
customer_reviews.author: Micro20

customer_reviews.title: Battery compartment could be better but so far worth the money
customer_reviews.text: To store your fingerprint you must remove the battery cover. I had the batteries pop out a couple of time while trying to store fingerprints for me and spouse. The knob to turn and open the door could be a bit bigger and easier to grab but it's workable. Other than that a good safe for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Leadingham

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and includes heavy duty adapter/screws to bolt down to the floor. I finally can rest easy knowing that my handguns are a fingerprint away and my expensive jewelry. I will have my son scan his fingerprint too (up to 50 they say) so he can have access to my stuff just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Mich

customer_reviews.title: Not quite square
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this would fit inside an IKEA shelf unit that has square openings for containers. This wouldn’t fit by about 1/2 an inch. I ended up putting it on top, doesn’t look as nice but the safe works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Short

customer_reviews.title: Great safe
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product, but it is still in the box in the garage after 8 months. My spouse thinks it is too much work to rip out sheet rock and mount it to the studs. Great idea. We had one in our other house. But age takes its toll
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B

customer_reviews.title: Good security with Quick convienient use for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Good inside space for jewellery, coins and important papers with a very fast convenient access. Won't keep professional thieves out but 90 percent of the smash and grab crocks will be deterred. Price is also affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph E. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Decent safe for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fast fingerprint scanner, easy to set up and use, requires batteries. The safe is large enough for multiple items. Heavy and sturdy. I wish it was fireproof, but for it's intended use and price, you can't go wrong. I would recommend if you understand it's limitations.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Arellano

customer_reviews.title: Finger Print Sensor Nor Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Do not expect to open the door when you need your items from this gun safe. The finger print sensor doors not work most of the time. I would say that it will open 5% of the tines when needed, I even reprogramed this system 8 times, and still the finger print sensor is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. & Mrs. Tester

customer_reviews.title: Fingerprint sensor intermittent
customer_reviews.text: Fingerprint sensor works most of the time, but you need to position your finger perfectly. Some other things can throw it off, like moist hands. I recorded several “versions” of my finger as you would for multiple users at different angles and positions and that seeemed to help
customer_reviews.author: Family Man

customer_reviews.title: Get something that has another way into it except for a biometric scanner
customer_reviews.text: The fingerprint scanner doesn't seem to work correctly all the time I usually end up having to use the key but it's dirty as hell it's big and it can hold all my stuff did I want protected just don't lose your key
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Safe
customer_reviews.text: Works great! And I like the finger print option to open door. Covered in felt inside and comes with two keys
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Newman

customer_reviews.title: Small personal safe
customer_reviews.text: This is a good safe for overall use. Finger scanning works well but you really need to scan the same finger four or five times to get the most consistent results. Cover over batteries not the most secure but acceptable if you don’t slam the safe closed.
customer_reviews.author: allison

customer_reviews.title: Great safe. Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very good safe. Finger print scanner works great but you do need to put fingers properly on the scanner. Was even larger than I thought and loved that. Room for everything to need to kept secure
customer_reviews.author: Eagle357

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment !!
customer_reviews.text: This safe was a total disappointment . The fingerprint recognition does not work as it should . It is impossible to program. The quality of the safe is sadly lacking. I would not recommend this safe to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Bertha little

customer_reviews.title: Overall works well but batteries fall out easily
customer_reviews.text: Good size and the fingerprint reader works well. The main issue I've noticed is that the battery panel easily falls off... so if you don't keep the back up keys handy you can find yourself locked out.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Fast reliable finger print reader
customer_reviews.text: The finger print reader is fast and reads my finger with just one attempt. The quality is not so great which is why I took away one star.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Privacy.
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loved it. Only he can enter it. His little sister and cousin can now leave his iPhone video games alone. LOL. He said.
customer_reviews.author: pam

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Bottom is thin metal could be cut with a strong knife. And if you move it around much it loses the programing.
customer_reviews.author: CyCy

customer_reviews.title: Fingerprint reader doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Paid an extra $40 for this safe over the one with the number pad, specifically for the fingerprint reader. The fingerprint reader registered one print, but failed to register anything after that. Tried resetting it, changing batteries, nothing. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Grant1525

customer_reviews.title: Waist of time move along
customer_reviews.text: It's a cheaply made flimsy and easy to break into with a freaking screwdriver and don't get me started onthe tiny piece of crap finger print scanner that rarely works.
customer_reviews.author: Skeletor

customer_reviews.title: Several months of usuage and no problems.
customer_reviews.text: The Biometric comments concerned me when we purchased this months ago, everything about it has worked fine for us.
customer_reviews.author: Len

customer_reviews.title: Glad we bought it.
customer_reviews.text: This stayed in my closet for a bit because I was frustrated with setting it up. But NOW it is awesome. Just took time figuring it out. Be patient.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good Safe
customer_reviews.text: The fingerprint reader Doesn’t work if it’s standing on its side but once flat it works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: ASidhu

customer_reviews.title: #1 safe
customer_reviews.text: The fingerprint is absolutely amazing. Works well and at first it is difficult to set up if you don’t read the manual so READ THE MANUAL. Very sturdy and amazon is amazing g
customer_reviews.author: Brian Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good product no complaints and I don't know how it does whit water but for what is meant to do it works just fine
customer_reviews.author: Luis Merida

customer_reviews.title: Works for 1 month
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 1 month. Never worked again after that.
customer_reviews.author: CD Tak

customer_reviews.title: Safe is smaller than it appears in the stock photo.
customer_reviews.text: Safe is smaller than it appears in the stock photo. Biometric reader is very basic and needs to be programmed multiple times for the same finger (in different position). Good enough given the low price.
customer_reviews.author: Zain Dada

customer_reviews.title: Decently big
customer_reviews.text: Was able to fit my valuables and more, great safe to start off with
customer_reviews.author: robert cerecer

customer_reviews.title: Nice safe!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice little safe! Perfect for what we need it for!
customer_reviews.author: Jrobinson1214

customer_reviews.title: Think twice about touch pad
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, we’ll constructed. The only issue I have with it is the finger print touch pad. It only works approximately 20% of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler C.

customer_reviews.title: Fingerprint reader could be better.
customer_reviews.text: The safe's seems to be well built. The fingerprint reader could be more accurate. Sometimes I have to scan my finger twice. I think if I ever needed to use it in an emergency it might not open.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben P.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Feels well made. It's easy to operate. The fingerprint reader is a little small for my finger but that never stops it from getting an accurate read. I was easily able to put this on a shelf without worrying about the weight
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas L.

customer_reviews.title: Easy use
customer_reviews.text: Easy use, and seems very secure. I'm glad I made this purchase. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: safe
customer_reviews.text: Could not get the finger print to work. Use it with key.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Aiken

customer_reviews.title: Fingerprint sensor is VERY hard to get working
customer_reviews.text: Well built unit but the fingerprint sensor is very picky and hard to get working.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice safe
customer_reviews.text: fast delivery, great safe, fits well in our hidden spot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice safe
customer_reviews.text: Good size for simple home use. Handgun, ammo, passports. That type of storage. Quality seems good. As advertised. Great price for features and functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Karen W.

customer_reviews.title: Then and light weight. Having issue with the biometric reader.
customer_reviews.text: Then and light wieght. Having issues with the biometric reader. Might send back. Maybe it's just a bad one.
customer_reviews.author: Bill R.

customer_reviews.title: Works just like showed and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Safe is well built and using it for personal belongings. Thanks Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Rouleau

customer_reviews.title: Finger print access is great
customer_reviews.text: Great safe. Love the finger print access, it makes it so easy to open and comes with hardware to secure safely
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Great item, glad I bought!
customer_reviews.text: Love the fingerprint feature. Size is perfect, holds everything I needed it for
customer_reviews.author: Kevin K

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice safe! Seems like it will do the job, everything worked as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: LEX

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes you have to do your finger print a few times before the safe will unlock. When setting up be sure to have the back of the battery compartment on or the batteries will fall out inside the safe and you will have to use the key.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rapid acess storage
customer_reviews.text: Biometric a little touchy but 90% success. Don't lose the keys.
customer_reviews.author: Paul D Grandon

customer_reviews.title: Nice size
customer_reviews.text: Pretty simple to use. Doesn't pop open. Must turn the knob after pressing for fingerprint. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Royalty

customer_reviews.title: Keep it safe
customer_reviews.text: Very easy set up and was exactly what was stated in ad
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: not the best finger print reader
customer_reviews.text: Product will serve it purpose but not the best fingerprint reader
customer_reviews.author: Bryant Palmore

customer_reviews.title: Good safe
customer_reviews.text: This product is lightweight and good quality. Everything works as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Verry light and paper thin walls
customer_reviews.text: Sadly all the quailty in this safe is the door. The walls of safe are paper thin

customer_reviews.title: Keep your hand guns locked up secure
customer_reviews.text: Needed another shelf and the finger print reader works, kind of, keep your key handy
customer_reviews.author: Kristy E.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Crap. Put batteries in and fingerprint scanner does not work. Tried new batteries and it still didn’t work. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: It is a good deal
customer_reviews.text: It was larger than I thought. The finger print reader is good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Equipment should be tested with older users
customer_reviews.text: The equipment does NOT properly recognize finger prints of older persons like me. It works OK with younger persons.
customer_reviews.author: DKS

customer_reviews.title: Key cover
customer_reviews.text: The cover that covers the key is plastic and break off easy can't be fixed
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Firm and strong safe.
customer_reviews.text: Firm and strong safe. Easy to use, you just simply use the key and you are ready to go. Not a big size, but spacious. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS SAFE!!!!  WORKS AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT Water Proof or Fire Proof, but otherwise this is a PERFECT safe!!!! The complaints on here about the finger print reader did not follow directions. They clearly to "place the same finger in multiple positions to ensure finger print is read more reliably." I used my thumb on each hand and placed in multiple positions to ensure it opens each time. I did this with BOTH hands and I have only had it NOT open once.
customer_reviews.author: Tpederson11

product_meta.title: AmazonBasics Biometric Fingerprint Safe - 1.8-Cubic Feet - 50FIC
feature_bullets: 1.8-cubic-foot safe with fingerprint-touch technology for quick access; ideal for storing important documents, jewelry, and other valuables; achieve greater security compared to a keypad
Biometric fingerprint sensor with 500 DPI semiconductor; excellent match speed of less than 1 second; holds up to 50 individual fingerprints; touch lifetime could reach 1,000,000 times
Heavy-duty carbon-steel construction (8-gauge steel door and 14-gauge steel body); 2 live-door bolts and pry-resistant concealed hinges for superior security
Back-up key for emergency use; includes pre-drilled mounting holes and hardware for floor and wall mounting
Exterior measures 13.8 by 13 by 19.7 inches (L x W x H); interior space measures 13.6 by 10.6 by 19.5 inches (L x W x H); backed by an AmazonBasics 1-year limited warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars621 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
